name: G Scope
effect: The Genesect-EX this card is attached to can also use the attack on this card. (You still need the necessary Energy to use this attack.)
author: 5ban Graphics

attacks.name: G Scope
attacks.effect: This attack does 100 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)

rule_box: You can’t have more than 1 ACE SPEC card in your deck.
